GeneralInformation.Name: Workforce.Miami
GeneralInformation.Focus: Economic development initiative in Miami-Dade County
GeneralInformation.Objective: Align job training, education, and employment opportunities with the needs of growing industries
GeneralInformation.EquityFocus: Equitable access for underrepresented communities (Black, Hispanic, women)
GeneralInformation.Connections: Job seekers, employers, and community partners
GeneralInformation.Goals: Address workforce shortages and local skills gap

Mission.Commitment: Closing the skills gap in Miami-Dade County
Mission.Goals: Provide access to competitive-wage jobs, career training, tailored resources

Vision.Goal: Increase capacity of employers and workers
Vision.Aspiration: Create an inclusive and prosperous Miami-Dade County

Values.Equity: Equitable job opportunities for historically marginalized communities
Values.Collaboration: Partnerships with local government, community organizations, employers
Values.Empowerment: Support and resources for individual and business success

Resources: Commitment to address disparities in education, training, employment

Steps: Click on 'Find a job' on the homepage
Use job search filters (industry, job type)
Click on 'Find a job' on the homepage
Use job search filters (industry, job type)
Login and access the Employer Dashboard
Fill out job posting details (title, description, etc.)

ApprenticeshipPrograms.Description: Customized apprenticeship programs to create a skilled talent pipeline, reducing recruitment costs and improving employee retention.
ApprenticeshipPrograms.Benefits: Aligns with operational needs, builds loyalty.

DiversityAndInclusionSupport.Description: Helps employers establish diversity commitments, set goals, and track progress.
DiversityAndInclusionSupport.Objective: Promote inclusive practices and workforce diversity.

WraparoundServices.Description: Provides support to ensure apprentices and employees succeed. Includes access to training, mentorship, and resources.

JobPostingsAndRecruitment.Description: List job opportunities on the platform to reach a diverse pool of job seekers.

InternshipPrograms.Description: Engage with internship programs to develop young talent.

WorkforceTrainingAndUpskilling.Description: Access resources to upskill current workforce, improving problem-solving and productivity.

ROIAndLongTermGrowth.Description: Supports creation of sustainable training models.
ROIAndLongTermGrowth.Benefit: For every dollar invested in apprenticeships, companies see an average return of $1.47.

JobListingsAndEmploymentOpportunities.Description: Centralized job board for exploring open positions aligned with skills and career goals.

ApprenticeshipPrograms.Description: Gain hands-on experience, training, and mentorship in structured environments.

PreApprenticeshipAndInternshipOpportunit.Description: Connects seekers, including students, to early career exposure and skill development.

WraparoundSupportServices.Description: Access to training, mentorship, and resources for addressing personal and professional challenges.

UpskillingAndTrainingPrograms.Description: Resources to enhance skills in high-demand fields like tech, healthcare, and renewable energy.

SupportForDiverseCommunities.Description: Provides equitable access for underrepresented communities through targeted programs and resources.

KeyPartners.Name: Future Ready Initiative Under Mayor Daniella Levine Cava

LocalFocusAndRelevance.Connections: Integrated with Miami's economic development initiatives.
LocalFocusAndRelevance.Benefits: Exclusive job postings tied to Miami-Dade County projects.

TailoredSupportForALICEPopulation.Description: Resources and opportunities tailored to ALICE needs, reducing employer administrative burdens.

ComprehensiveWorkforceDevelopment.Description: A comprehensive hub for employment opportunities, upskilling programs, and support services.
ComprehensiveWorkforceDevelopment.Partnerships: Leverages partnerships with reputable local organizations.

EnhancedJobMatchingAndQualityControl.Description: Uses advanced matching technology and vetting of opportunities.

SupportForEmployers.Services: Personalized landing pages, marketing, hiring fairs, and direct support.

CommunityAndGovernmentAlignment.Description: Aligned with Miami-Dade Countyâ€™s initiatives, offering socio-emotional and support services.

TechnologyIndustry.Overview: Growing employment in computer science and engineering with diversity challenges.

CleanEnergyIndustry.Overview: Rapidly growing sector with notable diversity gaps.

HospitalityAndTourismIndustry.Overview: Major industry with diversity and leadership gaps.

HealthCareAndSocialAssistance.Overview: One of the largest employers with growing service demand.

Construction.Overview: Crucial for Miami's infrastructure with many apprenticeship opportunities.

IndustryBenefits.CustomizedPrograms: Each industry benefits from customized apprenticeship programs, internship opportunities, and support services to help individuals navigate career pathways effectively.

InternshipsOrApprenticeshipsWithoutColle.Overview: Opportunities available without a college degree through Workforce.Miami.

Internships.TargetAudience: High School Students and Entry-Level Job Seekers
Internships.Qualifiers: Skills, motivation, relevant coursework or certifications

EquitableAccessToOpportunities.TargetedOutreach: Emphasis on job opportunities for underrepresented communities
EquitableAccessToOpportunities.ALICESupport: Tailored resources for living-wage jobs and career development

DiverseTalentPipelines.Programs: Internship and Apprenticeship Programs without a four-year degree
DiverseTalentPipelines.Training: Customized training programs for diverse candidates

AdvancedMatchingTechnology.CompetencyBasedMatching: Matches candidates based on skills and competencies
AdvancedMatchingTechnology.VettedJobPostings: Ensures quality and relevance of opportunities

EmployerSupport.CreatingPrograms: Helps employers design inclusive apprenticeship programs

FocusOnReducingEconomicDisparities.Alignment: Supports local government initiatives to reduce disparities

MeasuringImpact.TrackingMetrics: Offers tools to measure and report on diversity outcomes
MeasuringImpact.ContinuousImprovement: Encourages strategic review and best practice sharing

GettingStartedSteps: Newsletter - Stay updated on the latest job opportunities and training programsâ€”subscribe to our newsletter! Scroll to the bottom of the page and enter your email address.

ForEmployers.TailoredTraining: Customized programs to meet operational needs
ForEmployers.ReducedRecruitmentRisk: Minimized financial impact if trainee isn't a good match
ForEmployers.IncreasedRetention: Stronger loyalty and retention through training
ForEmployers.AccessToLargerTalentPool: Opportunities for candidates who show potential

RelationToWorkforceMiami.TechnicalAssistance: Supports employers in designing OJT programs
RelationToWorkforceMiami.EquityAndInclusionFocus: Promotes equitable access for underrepresented communities

WorkforceMiamiServicesForDisabilities.Description: Workforce.Miami offers targeted services to help individuals with disabilities thrive in the workforce by addressing common employment barriers.

KeyServices.Name: Apprenticeship and Internship Programs
KeyServices.Description: Provides hands-on training with wages from day one, allowing individuals to gain industry-relevant experience while learning on the job.

KeyServices.Name: Wraparound Support Services
KeyServices.Description: Includes career counseling, mentorship, and job-related education to help participants overcome personal and professional challenges.

KeyServices.Name: Skills Training and Upskilling
KeyServices.Description: Offers certifications and credentials to help job seekers with disabilities stand out to employers.

KeyServices.Name: Diversity-Focused Employer Network
KeyServices.Description: Collaborates with employers committed to inclusive hiring practices to create supportive work environments that embrace diversity and accessibility.

WorkforceMiamiSupportForFormerlyIncarcer.Description: Workforce.Miami offers inclusive support services for formally incarcerated individuals, focusing on reducing employment barriers and uplifting marginalized groups.

KeyResources.Name: Apprenticeships and Opportunities Hub
KeyResources.Description: Provides details on apprenticeships, internships, and jobs with pathways designed to reduce employment barriers for marginalized groups, including the formerly incarcerated.

KeyResources.Name: Apprenticeship Program Details
KeyResources.Description: Explains registered apprenticeships that build skills through hands-on training, mentorship, and structured environments, especially for those reentering the workforce.

youth_job_fairs_and_career_events.description: Collaborations to host youth job fairs and career events.
youth_job_fairs_and_career_events.upcoming_events: Check Workforce.Miami and CareerSource South Florida websites for announcements.

pre_apprenticeship_programs.description: Short-term training programs to prepare for full apprenticeship roles.
pre_apprenticeship_programs.program_features: Include basic skills training and industry exposure.

ServicesAndResourcesForEmployers.community_partnerships: Workforce.Miami partners with local schools, community organizations, and employers to offer comprehensive support.
ServicesAndResourcesForEmployers.how_to_get_involved: Visit the Workforce.Miami website or reach out to program coordinators for participation details.

navigate_to_registration_page.description: Look for a 'Sign Up' or 'Create Account' button on the homepage.
navigate_to_registration_page.location: Usually in the top right corner or main menu.

choose_your_account_type.job_seeker: Select if looking for job opportunities, apprenticeships, internships, or career resources.
choose_your_account_type.employer: Select if an employer looking to post job listings or access candidate resumes.

fill_out_registration_form.employer_additional_info: Company information, including business name and location.

steps_to_create_account.verify_email: Receive a verification email and click the link to verify your account.
steps_to_create_account.log_in_to_account: Return to the homepage and log in using your email and password.

set_up_profile.job_seekers: Add your resume, skills, and job preferences.
set_up_profile.employers: Set up company profile, including a company description and open job listings.

talent_pool_access.description: Employers can access resumes and profiles of job seekers via the Workforce.Miami Dashboard.

access_steps.description: Navigate to Employer Services on the homepage.
Register or log in to access the dashboard.
Access the Employer Dashboard to manage job postings and view profiles.
Use Search and Filter options to find candidates based on criteria.
Browse resumes and detailed profiles of job seekers.
Connect with candidates through messaging or by scheduling interviews.
Utilize Apprenticeship.Miami for talent development through internships and apprenticeships.

DisasterAssistance.Guidance: Workforce.Miami provides guidance and support to individuals and employers affected by natural disasters or other emergencies.

DisasterUnemploymentAssistance.Description: Helps workers who have lost their jobs or had their work hours reduced due to a natural disaster. Provides temporary income support to eligible individuals, including self-employed workers.
DisasterUnemploymentAssistance.Eligibility: Individuals must have lost employment or work hours as a direct result of a disaster and are not eligible for regular state unemployment benefits.

EmergencyEmploymentPrograms.Description: Connects affected individuals to emergency employment programs providing temporary jobs in disaster response and recovery.
EmergencyEmploymentPrograms.ProgramFeatures: Offers immediate employment opportunities for displaced workers while supporting community recovery efforts.

SupportForBusinesses.BusinessContinuityResources: Assists local businesses in accessing resources like Florida Small Business Emergency Bridge Loan Program, SBA Disaster Loans, and economic injury assistance.
SupportForBusinesses.EmployerAssistance: Help navigating workforce management during emergencies, including payroll, employee assistance, and support services.

RapidResponseServices.Description: Provides rapid response services to help manage workforce transitions during disasters, including layoff aversion strategies and reemployment support.

FloridaRebuildsProgram.Description: Offers temporary employment for individuals affected by hurricanes and natural disasters in roles such as construction and debris removal.
FloridaRebuildsProgram.Eligibility: Individuals who have lost their jobs due to the disaster or are long-term unemployed.

MiamiDadeCountyEmergencyManagement.Description: Provides local resources including shelter information, emergency updates, and recovery program guidance.

FEMA.Description: Offers financial assistance and services like housing assistance and crisis counseling to individuals and businesses affected by a disaster.

DisasterPreparednessAndRecovery.InformationAndGuidance: Workforce.Miami provides updated information on local, state, and federal resources during disaster events.
DisasterPreparednessAndRecovery.ResourceReferrals: Connects individuals and businesses with community partners, non-profit organizations, and government agencies.
DisasterPreparednessAndRecovery.EconomicMobilityDashboard: Features updates and resources relevant to disaster recovery and employment services during emergencies.

HealthcareResources.description: Information on local clinics, mental health services, and health insurance assistance. Workforce.Miami connects users to healthcare resources to support overall well-being and enable success in employment and career development.

LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.name: Community Health of South Florida, Inc. (CHI)
LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.description: Provides comprehensive healthcare services, including primary care, dental care, pediatrics, mental health services, and substance abuse treatment.
LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.services: General health check-ups, immunizations, family planning, and specialty care.

LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.name: Borinquen Medical Centers
LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.description: Offers a range of healthcare services such as primary care, womenâ€™s health, behavioral health, dental care, and HIV/AIDS services.

LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.name: Camillus Health Concern
LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.description: A healthcare provider specializing in serving the homeless and low-income individuals. Services include medical care, behavioral health support, substance abuse counseling, and preventive care.

LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.name: Miami Beach Community Health Center
LocalClinicsAndHealthCenters.description: Provides a variety of health services, including primary care, pediatrics, womenâ€™s health, and behavioral health services.

MentalHealthServices.name: Thriving Mind South Florida
MentalHealthServices.description: Connects individuals and families to a network of providers offering mental health and substance abuse services.

MentalHealthServices.name: Miami-Dade County Community Action and Human Services Department (CAHSD) â€“ Behavioral Health Services
MentalHealthServices.description: Provides mental health counseling, substance abuse treatment, and crisis intervention services for residents.

contactInformation.website: Miami-Dade Community Action Behavioral Health Services

MentalHealthServices.name: NAMI Miami-Dade County (National Alliance on Mental Illness)
MentalHealthServices.description: Offers support groups, educational programs, and mental health resources for individuals and families affected by mental illness.

MentalHealthServices.name: Institute for Child and Family Health (ICFH)
MentalHealthServices.description: Provides mental health counseling, psychiatric care, and family support services for children and adolescents.

MentalHealthServices.name: Miami Vet Center â€“ Readjustment Counseling for Veterans
MentalHealthServices.description: Provides mental health support, readjustment counseling, group therapy, and family counseling for veterans and their families.

HealthInsuranceAssistance.name: Florida KidCare
HealthInsuranceAssistance.description: Offers low-cost health insurance for children in Florida.

HealthInsuranceAssistance.name: Health Council of South Florida â€“ Health Insurance Marketplace Assistance
HealthInsuranceAssistance.description: Provides assistance with applying for health insurance through the Affordable Care Act (ACA) Marketplace.

HealthInsuranceAssistance.name: Covering Florida
HealthInsuranceAssistance.description: Offers free assistance with enrolling in health insurance plans through the ACA, Medicaid, and Medicare.

HealthInsuranceAssistance.name: Catalyst Miami â€“ Health Access Program
HealthInsuranceAssistance.description: Provides health insurance application support and health advocacy for low-income families.

EmergencyHealthServices.name: Jackson Health System â€“ Urgent Care and Emergency Services
EmergencyHealthServices.description: Offers emergency care, trauma services, and urgent care across Miami-Dade County.

SupportServices.description: Workforce Miami offers wraparound support services aimed at helping job seekers overcome barriers to employment, including assistance with basic needs such as food and housing.

HousingAndFoodResources.name: Miami-Dade Homeless Trust
HousingAndFoodResources.description: Offers housing programs, emergency shelters, and services for homeless individuals and families.

HousingAndFoodResources.name: Feeding South Florida
HousingAndFoodResources.description: Provides food distribution, pantries, and hunger relief programs throughout the region.

HousingAndFoodResources.name: Miami-Dade County Housing Programs
HousingAndFoodResources.description: Offers affordable housing resources, rental assistance, and public housing programs.
